tech.tablesaw.api.ml.clustering

Class LinkageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.tablesaw.api.ml.clustering.LinkageFactory

  • public class LinkageFactory
extends Object
    Cluster dissimilarity measures. An agglomerative hierarchical clustering builds the hierarchy from the individual elements by progressively merging clusters. The linkage criteria determines the distance between clusters (i.e. sets of observations) based on as a pairwise distance function between observations. Some commonly used linkage criteria are:
    • Maximum or complete linkage clustering (COMPLETE)
    • Minimum or single-linkage clustering (SINGLE)
    • Mean or average linkage clustering (UPGMA)
    • Unweighted Pair Group Method using Centroids (UPCMA). Also known as centroid linkage.
    • Weighted Pair Group Method with Arithmetic mean (WPGMA)
    • Weighted Pair Group Method using Centroids (WPGMC). Also known as median linkage.
    • Ward's linkage (WARD)
    Author:
    Haifeng Li (docs) and Chris Baker (code)
    See Also:
    linkage/package-info.java

      • createLinkage

        public smile.clustering.linkage.Linkage createLinkage(double[][] proximity,
                                                      LinkageFactory.type linkageType)
        Create a Linkage object.
        Parameters:
        proximity - the proximity matrix to store the measures of dissimilarity between each pair of observations/rows
        linkageType - the type of dissimilarity measure you would like to use when determining which clusters to merge
        Returns:
        a measure of dissimilarity between clusters
        See Also:
        Linkage.java
